title: I LIKE THE CHAT RESTRICTION!!!??
body: I got chat restricted, yes toxic noob i know, but i actually like this more. It makes me way less toxic and i think that this should become permanent. I honestly just use the chat for gj, but thats good because then when i get frustrated i have used my chats :) Pls riot make this a real thing, im tired of people like me that are taking their depression out on our games or just flame in general :)
